Joanne Yeh

My personal webpage and portfolio

Current:

Behavioral Researcher working at the Common Cents Lab to design and test solutions to increase the financial well being of low to middle income Americans. I’m generally interested in how technology can shape human behavior.

Past:

I’ve had a mix of academic and industry experience, in the areas concerning consumer behavior. I’m happiest crunching numbers where data meets behavior, especially with respect to individual spending habits. Last summer I studied abroad in Berlin and the summers before that, I was an intern at Chartcube and worked at the Rady Behavioral Lab as a research assistant. You can check out some of the work here. My professor also recently released a novel about behavioral economics and finding the right incentives, which you can find here.

Talk to me over email..
